title: Wild Hearts: A Mermaid Romance
description: ‘Beautifully crafted and wrapped in romance’A lonely cottage sits peacefully by a secluded beach in Cornwall. Serenaded by the sea, and the beauty of the surrounding hillside. Home to two sisters – Olivia and Rosie - with uncanny abilities.One day, the unconscious body of a man washes up on the beach. Rosie discovers, while tending to him, that there is more to him than meets the eye.The interjection of this stranger in the sisters’ sleepy lives leads them down a road latent with discovery. Not only of their shocking identities. But also of love.How will the troika fare when they find themselves in a love triangle?
author: Amaya Hart
